==Notes==
* Each trial must be completed in 30 minutes or less
* After completing each trial at least once, a combat record will show on the trial page, showing several stats:
** Fastest clear time
** Strongest Single Strike
** Least DMG taken
** A stat unique to each trial
*** Howling Trial Trial: Highest number of Swirl Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Stormwood Trial: Highest number of Aggravate/Spread Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Attrition Trial: Highest number of x Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Mist Trial: Highest number of x uses (in one trial attempt)
*** Sprouting Trial: Highest number of x Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Might Trial: Highest number of x Reactions (in one trial attempt)
*** Determination Trial: Number of times cleared

==Trial Characters==
{{Main|Misty Dungeon/2022-12-09/Characters|l1=Characters}}
All Trial Characters are at Level 80 with fixed weapons and artifacts.

==Trials==
===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Howling Trial.png|30px|link=]] Howling Trial===
{{Description|The dust heeds the call of the howling winds. When the {{Color|help|Swirl}} reaction is triggered, all party member will be buffed. Let the power of Anemo guide you to this trial's smooth completion.}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* When a {{Color|help|Swirl}} reaction is triggered, all your party member's Anemo DMG will be increased by {{Color|help|50%}}/75%/100%/125% for {{Color|help|10}}s. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate your characters' DMG.

;Opponents

===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Stormwood Trial.png|30px|link=]] Stormwood Trial===
{{Description|There is strong resonance between the flora and lightning in this place. When attacking opponents affected by the {{Color|help|Quicken}} reaction, the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of your character will both increase. Wield the power of Dendro and unleash your team's damage potential!}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* Attacking opponent affected by {{Color|help|Quicken}} will increase the CRIT Rate of the character by {{Color|help|10%}}/15%/20%/25% and their CRIT DMG by {{Color|help|20%}}/30%/40%/50%. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate your characters' CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Attrition Trial.png|30px|link=]] Attrition Trial===
{{Description|The opponents here lack the endurance to sustain a long battle. When characters take damage, the {{Color|help|Elemental Mastery}} of all party members will increase. When the effect reaches its maximum potential, all characters' {{Color|help|HP}} will increase additionally. Keep an eye on the statuses of your characters and outlast your opponents!}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* When a character {{Color|help|takes DMG}}, the Elemental Mastery of all your party members will increase by {{Color|help|30}}/45/60/75. This effect will persist for a single challenge and can stack up to {{Color|help|4}} times. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate your characters' Elemental Mastery.
* When the effect stacks over {{Color|help|4}} times, all your party members will have their HP increased by {{Color|help|20%}}/30%/40%/50%. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate your characters' HP.

;Opponents
''Final Challenge (Level 90)'' {{Enemy List|Geovishap*0;Nobushi: Hitsukeban*0;Nobushi: Jintouban*0;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*0;Eremite Sword-Dancer*0}}

===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Mist Trial.png|30px|link=]] Mist Trial===
{{Description|Mixing fire and water will allow you to soften your opponents' defenses. When the {{Color|help|Vaporize}} reaction is triggered, a shockwave will be unleashed, dealing AoE DMG to opponents. Use this opening to crush your foes!}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* When a character triggers a {{Color|help|Vaporize}} reaction, a shockwave will be unleashed, dealing DMG to nearby opponents. This effect can be triggered once every {{Color|help|4}}s. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate shockwave DMG.

===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Sprouting Trial.png|30px|link=]] Sprouting Trial===
{{Description|These spreading weeds are sturdy yet sensitive. When the {{Color|help|Quicken}}, {{Color|help|Aggravate}}, {{Color|help|Spread}}, {{Color|help|Bloom}}, or {{Color|help|Hyperbloom}} reaction is triggered, all party members will be buffed. Use this to your advantage and punch through your opponents' defenses!}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* When a character triggers a {{Color|help|Quicken}}, {{Color|help|Aggravate}}, {{Color|help|Spread}}, {{Color|help|Bloom}}, or {{Color|help|Hyperbloom}} reaction, the Elemental Mastery of all your party members will increase by {{Color|help|50}}/75/100/125 for {{Color|help|10}}s. The effects gained through said reactions will exist independently and be timed independently. Max {{Color|help|4}} stacks. Completing specific challenges in the trial will further elevate your characters' Elemental Mastery.

===[[File:Misty Dungeon 2022-12-09 Might Trial.png|30px|link=]] Might Trial===
{{Description|Overwhelming power is what will win you the day here. When a character's {{Color|help|Charged Attack}} hits an opponent, a shockwave will be unleashed, dealing DMG to nearby opponents. Unleash your might and decimate this trial!}}
;Ley Line Disorder
* When a character hits an opponent with a {{Color|help|Charged Attack}}, a Pyro/Hydro/Electro/Cryo shockwave will be unleashed randomly at the character's position, dealing respective Elemental DMG.
